        <div class="A-PNLINLNEMSGE-RW-ALL">
            <div class="notification-banner-icon">
                <i class="icon icon-circle-info" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="notification-banner-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL">
                <p>1) We are enhancing our HSBC HK App and Online Banking with additional security controls, please make sure your email address and mobile number are up to date in our records to receive both notifications via email and SMS after conducting certain transactions. If you don't have a valid email address and mobile number before Aug 2023, you will be blocked to conduct some of the transactions on Digital banking. <a href="/mobile/faq/#cp">Learn more</a></p>
<p> </p>
<p>2) We are continuously improving our apps to provide you with a smoother experience. Starting gradually in Jan 2025, we'll only support iOS 15.0 or above versions, and Android version 9.0 or above. Please update your device or set up the HSBC HK App on a supported device to continue enjoying our apps as usual. <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#manage-device" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>3) You can now monitor designated activities with the <a href="/mobile/faq/#security-activity-log">activity log</a> in the HSBC HK App, and identify any suspicious activity more easily.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>4) Switching to a new phone? Set up the HSBC HK App on it in just a few steps. Don't forget to verify your identity to enjoy our full range of services. <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#content_main_heading_5" target="_self">See how to set it up</a>.</p>

                
            </div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>For iPhone/ iPad from the App Store, download the app from the App Store. For Android download the app from Google Play (pre-installed on your phone) or the HSBC website.<br> </li> 
 <li>Update your device's operating system diligently and make sure you always have the latest version of our app.</li> 
 <li>Set up auto-lock and create a passcode to protect your device.</li> 
 <li>Do not leave your device unattended and always log off completely when you are finished banking.</li> 
 <li>Do a factory reset to wipe the data on your old device before you donate or resell it.</li> 
 <li> If you lose your device, please let us know immediately.</li> 
 <li>When using Wi-Fi, only use trusted Wi-Fi networks and enable security protection.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please visit www.hsbc.com.hk/help/online-and-banking-security/ for more security tips.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup><a id="1"></a>1</sup><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Note for FPS</span></p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">There is no charge from us if you pay money to, or receive money from accounts from other banks via FPS, but other banks may have different charging policies.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><sup><a id="2"></a>2</sup> Note for Mobile Account Opening</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">If you're new to HSBC and opening an account using the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app, you'll need to be an HKID holder (permanent or non-permanent resident) aged 18-64 residing in Hong Kong and not hold any HSBC banking or investment accounts or credit cards. Existing customers must hold a standalone HSBC current, savings, Time Deposit or investment account (not under an integrated account) in order to open an account using the app.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><sup><a id="3"></a>3</sup> Note for Push notifications</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">If you change your mobile device, you need to:<br>      (i) provide us with updated information on your mobile device<br>      (ii) update iOS or Android OS on your mobile device, and<br>      (iii) reinstall the HSBC Mobile Banking app ("app").<br> </span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">We only send push notifications once. If you delete the push notification we sent, that notification can't be sent again.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Any push notifications we send are one-way and shouldn't be replied to.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You should never respond to a push notification that appears to be from us asking you to provide your account or security details. We never make such a request.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Please make sure you have cellular data internet connection or WiFi internet connection. If you're travelling outside Hong Kong and wish to receive push notifications, please make sure you've enabled data roaming. You're responsible for any fees and charges arising from internet connection, whether local or international. Push Notification Alerts Service may not be available in certain countries or territories on some types of mobile devices.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Push notifications run on the services provided by Apple Inc. ("Apple") or Google LLC. ("Google"). Any delay or failure in delivering push notifications  due to Apple's or Google's service is beyond our control.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The alerts sent by push notifications may not be encrypted and may not be secure from corruption by third parties. You're responsible for ensuring that your mobile device is enabled with auto-lock and passcode lock to prevent unauthorised access.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Make sure your mobile device and other telecommunications equipment or services are capable of receiving Push Notification Alerts Service through push notifications.</span></li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> You may register one iOS device or one Android OS device to receive push notifications with. Your mobile device should be using the updated iOS or Android OS version we specify.</span></li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Apple, the Apple logo, iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, Touch ID and Face ID are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the US and other countries. App Store is a service mark of Apple Inc.</span><br> </li> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC. Android is a trademark of Google LLC.</span></li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The screen displays are for reference and illustration purposes only.</span></li> 
</ul>
